text: João Mário Ferreira Oliveira, known as João Mário (; born 28 December 1966) is a former Portuguese football player. He played 9 seasons and 199 games in the Primeira Liga for Braga, Tirsense and Famalicão. ==Club career== He made his Primeira Liga debut for Braga on 29 August 1987 as a starter in a 0–0 draw against Salgueiros. ==Personal== His son João Cunha is a professional footballer. ==References== ==External links== Category:1966 births Category:Sportspeople from Porto Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:F.C. title: João Mário (footballer, born 1966)
